finished.name: PBR-C1
finished.summary: PBR-C1 is a mobile wifi router (Pocket Router), match up with our PandoraBox OS., which is deeply developing based on OpenWrt. On this board, it can be not only used as a wifi router, but also can be matched with the LTE/3G modules, make it transfer single from 4G/3G to WI-FI, let you enjoy and share your WiFi in every places.
features: 4G/3G Wireless Router: Matched up with 4G/3G SIM card, transfers signal from 4G/3G to WiFi, enjoy and share WiFi in every places.
Transfers Wired to Wireless: Connect the Internet cable to the WAN port of PBR-C1, it can be used as a traditional router no matter in Hotel, Home or Office...
5200mAh Power Bank: Embedded a 5200mAh battery and power protection circuits, it can be charged 2-3 times for cellphone , MP3 player and so on.

LTE: LTE/3G Module: Embedded Stamp hole connection for LTE/3G Module

soft_others: DHCP: Server, Client, DHCP Client List, Address Reservation
Firewall Security: Dos, SPI Firewall, IP Address Filter, MAC Address Filter, Domain Filter, IP and MAC Address Binding

finished.name: PBR-M1
finished.summary: PBR-M1 is an advanced wired & wireless router, which is support IEEE 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac. It’s a duel band wireless (2.4GHz & 5GHz) router, supports 2x2 MIMO, the maximum theoretical wireless speed can be up to 1200Mbps. It’s about 4 times of the traditional routers. PBR-M1 designed with SATA socket, RTC and TF-card slot… Users can not only use it as a traditional router, but also can enjoy and share videos, pictures and files… Match up with PandoraBox OS. and applications, it can become a high performance management terminal and an intelligent center device.
features: PBR-M1 designed with all gigabit WAN/LAN ports, with variety of connectors, such as: USB3.0, SATA, eSATA+USB2.0, TF-card slot... Users can DIY it as a NAS, private cloud, management terminal or other multi-function equipment
Matched up with PandoraBox OS., make it more stable, more effective and easier setup
Matched up with the Applications (Router APP.), it can become a high performance management terminal and an intelligent center device.

CPU: EN:MTK MT7621A(双核)解决方案,主频高达880MHz

Operating System: 网络接入方式PPPoE拨号、动态IP、静态IP
File Server Functionality: DHCP功能(Server, Client, DHCP Client List, Address Reservation)
Firewall / Security: 防火墙(IP Address Filter/MAC Address Filter/ Domain Filter)
soft_others: 其他设置(Mac clone、NTP Synchronize、Web firmware upgrade)

temperature: 温度工作温度：0℃ 到 40℃ 存储温度：-40℃ 到 70℃
湿度工作湿度：10% 到 90%RH 不凝结 存储湿度：5% 到 90%RH 不凝结
SSID: 出厂默认设置SSID:Pandorabox+MAC地址后6位
accessories: 包装配件M1*1《快速安装指南》*1 网线 *1 保修卡 *1 适配器 *1

finished.name: PBR-M2
finished.summary: PBR-M2 is an advanced wired & wireless router, which is support IEEE 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac. It’s a duel band wireless (2.4GHz & 5GHz) router, supports 2x2 MIMO, the maximum theoretical wireless speed can be up to 1200Mbps. It’s about 4 times of the traditional routers. Increase a touch panel to control the power lights and duel band signal-amplifier, WiFi signal can be transmited stronger and farther. Moreover, PBR-M2 designed with a USB3.0 socket, means it can support high effective files transfer. With USB2.0, TF-card socket users can not only use it as a traditional router, but also can enjoy and share videos, pictures, files… Match up with PandoraBox OS. and applications, it can become a high performance management terminal and an intelligent center device.
features: EN:基于OpenWrt自主深度开发的PandoraBox操作系统，配以阿里智能ALink平台，极大地扩展了路由器的功能和应用：M2在2.4G和5G的功率方面，在硬件上也做了改善，分别添加了一组PA(俗称'无线放大器')，大大加强了无线覆盖范围。有线方面支持四个千兆LAN口。支持一个USB3.0接口，支持DLNA。
EN:配合丰富的插件可以实现视频监控、视频共享、脱机下载、离线下载等智能路由器的全新功能。
EN:有线方面支持四个千兆LAN口。支持一个USB3.0接口，一个USB2.0；USB3.0接口的设备提供高达1.5A的电流，智能手机、平板电脑提供标准1A充电电流。可以在充电的同时把移动设备中的各种文件共享或备份到路由器所接的硬盘内。软件为硬盘保护做了专门设计，实现对硬盘工作状态的掌控和保护。

CPU: EN:MTK MT7621A解决方案,主频高达880MHz

Operating System: 网络接入方式PPPoE拨号、动态IP、静态IP
File Server Functionality: DHCP功能(Server, Client, DHCP Client List, Address Reservation)
Firewall / Security: 防火墙(IP Address Filter/MAC Address Filter/ Domain Filter)
Port Fowarding / DMZ / uPNP: 端口转发(Virtual Server, Port Triggering, UPnP, DMZ)
soft_others: 其他设置(Mac clone、NTP Synchronize、Web firmware upgrade)

finished.name: PBR-W1
finished.summary: PBR-W1 is a high cost performance wired & wireless router, which is support IEEE 802.11 a/b/g/n. It’s a single band wireless (2.4GHz) router, the maximum theoretical wireless speed can be up to 300Mbps. Match up with PandoraBox OS., it can become a high cost performance gateway device.
features: EN:采用QFN的封装，性能更稳定，整体功耗降低
EN:全新的wifi模块，硬件上解决了wifi抗干扰差的问题
EN:去掉了不实用的HWNAT，增加了硬件加密加速模块
EN:提供'刷机模式'，用户可轻松更新固件

finished.name: PBR-W3
finished.summary: PBR-W3 is a high cost performance wired & wireless router, which is support IEEE 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac. It’s a duel band wireless (2.4GHz & 5GHz) router, supports 2x2 MIMO, the maximum theoretical wireless speed can be up to 1200Mbps. It’s about 4 times of the traditional routers. PBR-W3 designed with USB2.0 socket, users can not only use it as a traditional router, but also can enjoy and share videos, pictures and files… Match up with PandoraBox OS. and applications, it can become a high performance management terminal and an intelligent center device.
features: EN:新一代双频MIMO 2*2阵列黄铜天线，配以4天线单元，镀金天线接驳，大幅度增强无线信号的稳定性及穿透力，增大覆盖范围。
EN:有线方面支持两个百兆LAN口。支持一个USB接口，可以为一般USB接口的设备提供高达1A的电流，智能手机、平板电脑提供标准500mA充电电流。
EN:支持无线中继功能，只需简单几步，就可以成为主路由的中继器，让信号遍布每个角落。
EN:从你连接网络的那一刻起，它将自动为你开启防火墙。无论是恶意攻击还是闲人蹭网，统统逃不过PBR-W3的“安全过滤”。
